message:
Fixed #106
Fixed serialisation of resources without id attribute set

added: JsonNode jsonLinks = getResourceLinks(object, attributesNode, id, settings);
private JsonNode getResourceLinks(Object resource, ObjectNode serializedResource, JsonNode idNode,
deleted: JsonNode jsonLinks = getResourceLinks(object, attributesNode, id.textValue(), settings);
private JsonNode getResourceLinks(Object resource, ObjectNode serializedResource, String resourceId,
